name: Wellness & Preventative Care
description: All Planned Parenthood health centers provide sexual and reproductive health wellness care, like cancer screenings. Many health centers provide even more preventive care if you don’t have other access to a primary care doctor. You can get a lot of your wellness and preventive care check-ups, screenings, and more at your nearest Planned Parenthood health center. We offer services in: - Abnormal Pap test follow-up (colposcopy, cryotherapy, LEEP) - Anal cancer screening - Anemia testing - Cervical

whatTheyOffer: All Planned Parenthood health centers provide sexual and reproductive health wellness care, like cancer screenings. Many health centers provide even more preventive care if you don’t have other access to a primary care doctor. You can get a lot of your wellness and preventive care check-ups, screenings, and more at your nearest Planned Parenthood health center. We offer services in: - Abnormal Pap test follow-up (colposcopy, cryotherapy, LEEP) - Anal cancer screening - Anemia testing - Cervical
howToGetIt: Not every Planned Parenthood health center provides all services. Check with your nearest Planned Parenthood health center about the services they offer. Talk to Planned Parenthood staff online or in-person at your local health center to get the care you need. Make an appointment online or call 1-800-230-PLAN.
agency: Planned Parenthood - San Francisco Health Center
